name: The Temple Sword
description:
Created by:

Greg Belasco – Environmental Artist, Cutscene Aficionado

Jon Brauer – Project Manager, Design & Narrative Lead

Jaina Modisett – Programming Lead

James Paisley – Art & Animations Lead

Dillon Freeman– Level Designer

Daniel Montes – Level Designer

Adam Gaddis – Programmer

Andrew Forrester – Sound Designer

Built with Unity Engine using "3D Game Kit" assets

You play as Ellen, a fearless explorer on a mission to retrieve a powerful weapon on an alien planet. Upon arriving, the planet seems a bit stranger and more hostile than originally anticipated. You must explore and fight your way through hordes of enemies, as well as solving puzzles that block your way in order to gain access back to your starship to escape. Do you have what it takes?
